author: Mr. & Mrs. Sperling
title: Mr. & Mrs. Sperling
text:
I send a long note to Billie about how pleasantly satisfied we are with both Billie and Simon team ,
All were over our expectations. Please see comments send to Billie both employes should be recognized for their excellent work.
Regards,
Suzanne. Chuck Sperling
